metadata.Title: CVE-2020-13692 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
PostgreSQL JDBC Driver (aka PgJDBC) before 42.2.13 allows XXE.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2020-13692` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libpostgresql-jdbc-java - 42.2.12-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libpgjava package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '42.2.12-2').
